activities:
PEER 1 is a web hosting company that receives personal information online for sales, support, and billing purposes from new clients, customers, and/or accounts.  PEER 1 collects this information from clients in the EU that PEER 1 may provide services to during the course of their business relationship.

Customer Information:  PEER 1 participates in the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor privacy principles with respect to personal data as representatives of certain customers from the European Union (EU) in connection with its hosting services.  As a hosting provider, PEER 1 may manage data on behalf of its customers that could transfer their data from the EU to the United States.  PEER 1 does not own this specific data and is not a "data controller" as outlined in the EU data protection directive.  To the extent that PEER 1 is exposed to customer data, PEER 1 is obligated to adhere to all the applicable privacy laws and regulations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
